data.title: Wikiwand articles
data.meta_description: The Consequences is a 2021 family drama film directed by Claudia Pinto Emperador. It stars Juana Acosta, Alfredo Castro, María Romanillos, and Carme Elias.
data.text:
The Consequences was directed by Claudia Pinto Emperador whereas the screenplay was co-written by Pinto alongside Eduardo Sánchez Rugeles.[2]

Produced by Sin Rodeos Films and Las consecuencias AIE in co-production with N279 Entertainment, Potemkino and Érase una vez Films, the production was supported by RTVE, Eurimages, IVC (Institut Valencià de Cultura), the Netherland Film Fund, the Netherland Film Production Incentive, À Punt Mèdia, TV3 and it had the participation of CREA SRG.[3] The film is an international Spanish–Belgian–Dutch co-production (70% – 15% – 15%).[4] It was shot in 2019 in between the Valencia region and the Canary Islands, primarily displaying natural landscapes of the islands of La Palma and La Gomera.[5][6][7]
